user.title: Select Instance Type
user.description: Choose the type of solar forecast instance to create.

data_description.instance_type:
**Normal**: Configure a single panel orientation (e.g., East, South, West)
**Cumulative**: Aggregate forecasts from multiple orientations into a single total forecast

normal.title: Configure Single Orientation
normal.description: Configure solar panels for a single orientation. You can mark this instance to be included in a cumulative forecast.

data_description.modules_power: Total Watt peak power of your solar modules
data_description.inverter_power: The capacity of your inverter in Watt (0 for no limit)
data_description.damping_morning: Adjusts results in morning (0.0 = no damping, 1.0 = max damping)
data_description.damping_evening: Adjusts results in evening (0.0 = no damping, 1.0 = max damping)
data_description.efficiency_factor: DC wiring efficiency (0.0 = 100% loss, 1.0 = no loss)
data_description.include_in_cumulative: Enable to include this orientation in cumulative forecast calculations
data_description.name: Name this instance by orientation (e.g., 'East Panels', 'South Panels', 'West Panels')

cumulative.title: Configure Cumulative Forecast
cumulative.description: This instance will aggregate forecasts from all orientations marked for cumulation. It provides combined production forecasts.
